title: Rydon Solar Powered Bike Light delivers 300 Lumens for 50 hours on a full charge
content:
This could be a great option for commuters who occasionally forget to recharge their lights, or for riders doing long bikepacking trips with infrequent access to mains electricity. Going more for the built-like-a-tank aesthetic than a sleek aerodynamic one, Rydon have powered up a 300 lumen solar powered bike light to keep your path illuminated […]
